name: Cumulonimbus
appearance: Dark-based storm cloud capable of impressive vertical growth
precipitation: Very common rain, snow, snow pellets or hail, heavy at times

name: Cumulus
appearance: Low-altitude, fluffy heaps of clouds with cotton-like appearance
precipitation: Uncommon rain, snow, or snow pellets

name: Stratocumulus
appearance: Thicker, dark gray, and somewhat conjoined heaps of clouds
precipitation: Uncommon rain, snow, or snow pellets

name: Cirrus
appearance: Delicate and wispy with white strands
precipitation: Uncommon rain, snow; common snow pellets

name: Stratus
appearance: Gray, featureless low-altitude cloud capable of ground contact
precipitation: Common Drizzle, freezing drizzle, anow or snow grains
